Area/postal codes & others --------> |postal_code_type = |postal_code = |area_code = |website = |footnotes = }} '''Zhanang County''', ([[Tibetan script|Tibetan]]:གྲ་ནང་རྫོང་ [[Tibetan transliteration (Wylie)|Wylie]] gra nang rdzong; [[Chinese character|Chinese]]: 扎囊县; [[Pinyin]]: Zhānáng Xiàn) is a county of the [[Shannan Prefecture]] in the [[Tibet Autonomous Region]], As of 2000 it had a population of 35,278. ==Demographics== {| border=1 style="border-collapse: collapse;" |-bgcolor=cccccc ! Ethnicity ! Population ! Percentage |- | [[Tibetan people|Tibetan]] | 35.018 | 99,26% |- | [[Han Chinese|Han]] | 235 | 0,67% |- | [[Hui Chinese|Hui]] | 8 | 0,02% |- | [[Miao people|Miao]] | 5 | 0,01% |- | [[Tujia people|Tujia]] | 4 | 0,01% |- | Sonstige | 8 | 0,02% |} {{Shannan-geo-stub}} {{County-level divisions of Tibet}} {{Shannan Prefecture}} {{coord|29|27|54|N|91|36|40|E|region:CN-54_type:adm2nd_source:dewiki|display=title}} [[Category:Counties of Tibet]] [[Category:Shannan Prefecture]]
